com.neophob.lpd6803
Class Lpd6803

java.lang.Object
  com.neophob.lpd6803.Lpd6803

public class Lpd6803
extends Object

library to communicate with an LPD6803 stripes via serial port


part of the neorainbowduino library.

Author:
Michael Vogt / neophob.com

Method Summary
 boolean connected()
          return connection state of lib.
 byte[] convertBufferTo15bit(int[] data, ColorFormat colorFormat)
          Convert buffer to15bit.
 void dispose()
          clean up library.
 long getAckErrors()
          how may times the serial response was missing / invalid.
 int getArduinoBufferSize()
          return the serial buffer size of the arduino the buffer is by default 128 bytes - if the buffer is most of the time almost full (>110 bytes) you probabely send too much serial data.
 int getArduinoErrorCounter()
          get last error code from arduino if the errorcode is between 100..109 - serial connection issue (pc-arduino issue) if the errorcode is < 100 it's a i2c lib error code (arduino-rainbowduino error) check http://arduino.cc/en/Reference/WireEndTransmission for more information
 long getArduinoHeartbeat()
          per default arduino update this library each 3s with statistic information this value save the timestamp of the last message.
 boolean ping()
          send a serial ping command to the arduino board.
 boolean sendFrame(byte ofs, byte[] data)
          send a frame to the active lpd6803 device.
 boolean sendRgbFrame(byte ofs, int[] data, ColorFormat colorFormat)
          wrapper class to send a RGB image to the lpd6803 device.
 String version()
          return the version of the library.

public void dispose()
clean up library.

public String version()
return the version of the library.

Returns:

connected

public boolean connected()
return connection state of lib.

Returns:
whether a lpd6803 device is connected

ping

public boolean ping()
send a serial ping command to the arduino board.

Returns:
wheter ping was successfull (arduino reachable) or not

sendRgbFrame

public boolean sendRgbFrame(byte ofs,
                            int[] data,
                            ColorFormat colorFormat)
wrapper class to send a RGB image to the lpd6803 device. the rgb image gets converted to the lpd6803 device compatible "image format"

Parameters:
ofs - the image ofs
data - rgb data (int[64], each int contains one RGB pixel)
colorFormat - the color format
Returns:
true if send was successful

sendFrame

public boolean sendFrame(byte ofs,
                         byte[] data)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
send a frame to the active lpd6803 device.

Parameters:
ofs - - the offset get multiplied by 32 on the arduino!
data - byte[3*8*4]
Returns:
true if send was successful
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception

getArduinoErrorCounter

public int getArduinoErrorCounter()
get last error code from arduino if the errorcode is between 100..109 - serial connection issue (pc-arduino issue) if the errorcode is < 100 it's a i2c lib error code (arduino-rainbowduino error) check http://arduino.cc/en/Reference/WireEndTransmission for more information

Returns:
last error code from arduino

getArduinoBufferSize

public int getArduinoBufferSize()
return the serial buffer size of the arduino the buffer is by default 128 bytes - if the buffer is most of the time almost full (>110 bytes) you probabely send too much serial data.

Returns:
arduino filled serial buffer size

getArduinoHeartbeat

public long getArduinoHeartbeat()
per default arduino update this library each 3s with statistic information this value save the timestamp of the last message.

Returns:
timestamp when the last heartbeat receieved. should be updated each 3s.

getAckErrors

public long getAckErrors()
how may times the serial response was missing / invalid.

Returns:
the ack errors

convertBufferTo15bit

public byte[] convertBufferTo15bit(int[] data,
                                   ColorFormat colorFormat)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
Convert buffer to15bit.

Parameters:
data - the data
colorFormat - the color format
Returns:
the byte[]
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
